trans-unit.source: Use your current Mac computer to develop apps for Windows.
trans-unit.target: Use your current Mac computer to develop apps for Windows.

trans-unit.source: Setting up your Mac with Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Setting up your Mac with Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Setting up your Mac with Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Setting up your Mac with Windows 10

trans-unit.source: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: \[ Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132) \]

trans-unit.source: Use your current Mac computer to develop apps for Windows.
trans-unit.target: Use your current Mac computer to develop apps for Windows.

trans-unit.source: Run Windows on your Mac and use Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Run Windows on your Mac and use Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: Are you ready to start developing Universal Windows apps, but you don't have a PC handy?
trans-unit.target: Are you ready to start developing Universal Windows apps, but you don't have a PC handy?

trans-unit.source: That's okay — you can use your Mac!
trans-unit.target: That's okay — you can use your Mac!

trans-unit.source: With popular third-party solutions like Apple Boot Camp, Oracle VirtualBox, VMware Fusion, and Parallels Desktop, you can install Windows 10 and Microsoft Visual Studio on your Apple computer.
trans-unit.target: With popular third-party solutions like Apple Boot Camp, Oracle VirtualBox, VMware Fusion, and Parallels Desktop, you can install Windows 10 and Microsoft Visual Studio on your Apple computer.

trans-unit.source: **Note** You will need a Windows 10 bootable image on disk or USB flash drive.
trans-unit.target: **Note** You will need a Windows 10 bootable image on disk or USB flash drive.

trans-unit.source: If you are a MSDN Subscriber, you can download the install image from the MSDN Subscriber Downloads center.
trans-unit.target: If you are a MSDN Subscriber, you can download the install image from the MSDN Subscriber Downloads center.

trans-unit.source: If you aren't a subscriber, the installer can be purchased from the [Windows Store](http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/app).
trans-unit.target: If you aren't a subscriber, the installer can be purchased from the [Windows Store](http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/app).

trans-unit.source: You can also download it from [this location](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=623906), which is useful if you are already running Windows and wish to upgrade.
trans-unit.target: You can also download it from [this location](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=623906), which is useful if you are already running Windows and wish to upgrade.

trans-unit.source: Once you have Windows running, you can then install Visual Studio 2015 from [Developer downloads for Windows 10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=302144) and start writing apps!
trans-unit.target: Once you have Windows running, you can then install Visual Studio 2015 from [Developer downloads for Windows 10](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=302144) and start writing apps!

trans-unit.source: **Note** If you plan to use the Visual Studio device emulators, you **must** install a 64-bit (x64) version of Windows 10 Pro or better.
trans-unit.target: **Note** If you plan to use the Visual Studio device emulators, you **must** install a 64-bit (x64) version of Windows 10 Pro or better.

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, some older Macs cannot run 64-bit Windows.
trans-unit.target: Unfortunately, some older Macs cannot run 64-bit Windows.

trans-unit.source: Please check with Apple if your hardware is compatible on this[Apple support page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=397959).
trans-unit.target: Please check with Apple if your hardware is compatible on this[Apple support page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=397959).

trans-unit.source: Apple Boot Camp
trans-unit.target: Apple Boot Camp

trans-unit.source: The Boot Camp Assistant app is pre-installed on every recent Mac, and launching it will walk you through the process of installing Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: The Boot Camp Assistant app is pre-installed on every recent Mac, and launching it will walk you through the process of installing Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: All you need is a copy of Windows (from the sources listed above) and at least 30 Gb of free disk space.
trans-unit.target: All you need is a copy of Windows (from the sources listed above) and at least 30 Gb of free disk space.

trans-unit.source: Once installed, you can choose to boot into Mac OSX or Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Once installed, you can choose to boot into Mac OSX or Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see Apple's [Boot Camp instructions page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=623912).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see Apple's [Boot Camp instructions page](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=623912).

trans-unit.source: Parallels Desktop
trans-unit.target: Parallels Desktop

trans-unit.source: Using Parallels Desktop 11, you can run Windows apps side-by-side with existing Mac applications, including Visual Studio and Cortana.
trans-unit.target: Using Parallels Desktop 11, you can run Windows apps side-by-side with existing Mac applications, including Visual Studio and Cortana.

trans-unit.source: A pro version is available that includes extra features for developers, including improved debugging, and support for Docker and Jenkins.
trans-unit.target: A pro version is available that includes extra features for developers, including improved debugging, and support for Docker and Jenkins.

trans-unit.source: For more info, and a free trial version, see [Parallels Desktop](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=281827).
trans-unit.target: For more info, and a free trial version, see [Parallels Desktop](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=281827).

trans-unit.source: VMWare Fusion
trans-unit.target: VMWare Fusion

trans-unit.source: Fusion 8 from VMWare will let you run Visual Studio right on your Mac desktop.
trans-unit.target: Fusion 8 from VMWare will let you run Visual Studio right on your Mac desktop.

trans-unit.source: A pro version is available to offer developers some more advanced features such as vSphere support.
trans-unit.target: A pro version is available to offer developers some more advanced features such as vSphere support.

trans-unit.source: For more info, and a free trial version, see [VMware Fusion](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=281826).
trans-unit.target: For more info, and a free trial version, see [VMware Fusion](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=281826).

trans-unit.source: Oracle VirtualBox
trans-unit.target: Oracle VirtualBox

trans-unit.source: VirtualBox is a free application for running virtual machines on your computer, and it supports running Windows on Mac.
trans-unit.target: VirtualBox is a free application for running virtual machines on your computer, and it supports running Windows on Mac.

trans-unit.source: It is a no-frills option, but the price is appealing.
trans-unit.target: It is a no-frills option, but the price is appealing.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [VirtualBox](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=280599).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [VirtualBox](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=280599).
